authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Higher Education General Information Survey (HEGIS) series was designed to provide comprehensive information on various aspects of postsecondary education in the United States and its territories (American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and the Marshall Islands) and Department of Defense schools outside the United States. Data are available for both public and private two-year and four-year institutions. The HEGIS Fall Enrollment component for 1976 sought enrollment data from 3,073 institutions of higher education. The data file contains up to three record types for each institution, and offers information on total enrollments of full-time and part-time students by class level, sex, race, and first-time enrollment status, as well as information on the institutions' type of accreditation, type of calendar system, total number of students, full-time credit hour load, number of part-time students reported, number of part-time credits reported, and total credits for all students.

topicClassValue.value: IDRC VI. Human Dimension of International Relations

fields.value: Version Date: 1998-12-17Version Text: 1998-12-17Version Date: 1998-12-17Version Text: 1998-12-17 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Revised data are now available for this collection,  along with a record layout (Excel worksheet) and a revised codebook in a PDF file.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: LRECL;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: The HEGIS Record Layout file (Part 2) is an Excel worksheet of record layouts for all components of the HEGIS survey, including the 1976 Fall Enrollment component.;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: This collection has not been processed by ICPSR staff. ICPSR is distributing the data and documentation for this collection in essentially the same form in which they were received. When appropriate, hardcopy documentation has been converted to machine-readable form and variables have been recoded to ensure respondents' anonymity.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;

value: Public and private two- and four-year institutions of higher education in the United States, the District of Columbia, and outlying territories (American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and the Marshall Islands) and Department of Defense schools outside the United States.
